title: 【活動轉知】綠色和平帶你構想一場「反漂綠」倡議 工作坊 | Tips and Tricks to Develop an Anti-Greenwashing Campaign: Ideation Workshop
content:
分類： 演講暨研討會, 其他公告
來源： 永續發展中心籌備處 - 李敏賢 - jordanlee@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5919
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【活動轉知】綠色和平帶你構想一場「反漂綠」倡議 工作坊 | Tips and Tricks to Develop an Anti-Greenwashing Campaign: Ideation Workshop
日期： Mon, 22 Apr 2024 16:59:04 +0800

Care about climate change, but don’t know what you can do? 
Want to hold corporations responsible but doubt the power of an individual?
Want to start a social impact campaign but don’t know how to start? 
This workshop is for you!

關心氣候變遷，但不知道自己能做些什麼？
想要企業為碳排負責，卻不知以個人的力量如何監督？
想要為正義發聲，但不知道如何開始？
來我們的工作坊吧！

Reformosa has invited Greenpeace, an international NGO advocating for environmental protection since 1971, to share its experience and expertise and guide us in ideating campaigns to keep Taiwanese companies accountable for their carbon emissions and environmental impact. 

Reformosa福爾摩擦邀請了國際環保倡議組織綠色和平與我們分享他們在環保倡議超過50年的經驗與專業知識，並且通過此次工作坊指導我們構想反漂綠倡議，以監督台灣企業的碳排以及環境影響。
 
｜活動簡介 Workshop Overview |
Time 時間: 2024.05.08 18:30 - 20:30 
Location 地點: Greenpeace Taipei Office 綠色和平台北辦公室 (https://maps.app.goo.gl/nVdWf8sASKgovgUt5)  
Topic 主題: Tips and Tricks to Develop an Anti-Greenwashing Campaign
Admissions: Free! 免費參加！

Workshop Agenda
18:00 - 18:30 Doors open/food! 簽到/吃晚餐 [建議自行攜帶環保餐具!] 
18:30 - 18:35 Introduction 開場
18:35 - 18:55 Presentation "Tips and Tricks to Develop an Anti-Greenwashing Campaign" 綠色和平簡報; Speaker: Lydia Fang 方君維, Greenpeace Campaigner 
18:55 - 19:30 Group discussion 小組討論
19:30 - 19:40 Break 休息
19:40 - 20:05 Group sharing 小組分享
20:05 - 20:15 Closing 結語
20:15 - 20:30 Free discussion and networking 自由討論

Is dinner provided? 會有晚餐嗎？
Yes! Dinner will be served in reusable containers. Please bring your reusable utensils (chopsticks, forks, spoons etc.)! 
有的！響應環保，晚餐將會使用環保餐盒，請參與者自行攜帶餐具！

This event is open to everyone eager to make a difference. No prior experience is required—just bring your enthusiasm and creativity! We look forward to your participation and to collectively ideating impactful solutions to combat greenwashing.
